monster.name: Giant Bat

trait.name: Echolocation
trait.text: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 323, Princes of the Apocalypse, Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage, Mythic Odysseys of Theros, Tasha's Cauldron of Everything
